caseTitle: Muhammad Yaseen and another v. Province of Sindh through its Secretary Education and Literacy Department Govt. of Sindh at Karachi and others
tagline: (1) No condition was mentioned in the appointment letters that petitioners are contractual employees. (2) No show cause notice was issued before termination of employment which was in violation of Article 10A of the Constitution. (3) The Chief Secretary was directed to constitute Inquiry Committee and take action.
